name: Eyes on Me
description:
Control two disembodied eyeballs as you crash, splat, and smear your way through this weird and wacky platformer! Climb furniture, smash stuff and leave a mess wherever you go as you try your best to explore every corner of a cluttered lab room. You could even share half the controller with a friend to double the madness!

Controller required. 

This game will ask to use your webcam for a little gameplay surprise, but please feel free to say "No!" - the game will still work fine!

Design - Nguyen Truong, Ben Bartley

Art - Nguyen Truong

Code - Ben Bartley
